item.description:

case 123: talk2("Hello stranger....", "I don't have a job for you today.", 1576); playertalk("Who are you?.", "....."); talk2("Non of your business", "", 1576); playertalk("What is that all about", ""); break;

This is what i have as dialogue for my NPC when i talk to it you see the first text but in 1 second its at the last :S how can i fix this soo i need to press continue?

In my quest tab are all diferent quest like dragon slayer demon slayer how can i clear this options and where do i need to do this client class or player class ?
